description:
Practice in reading, speaking, and writing for students whose first language is not English. Texts will be primarily essays, but may also include other literary forms. Frequent writing assignments. Reading lists vary with each section. 

This course fulfills the writing requirement for all undergraduates, but students who need additional practice are encouraged to take a second writing seminar.
name: WRITING SEM INT'L STUDNT: GLOBAL ENGLISH
